originalName: [SDS VN] Fast Business_Check Payslip on Web-1770710745377-929087528.pdf
content:
STEP 2:
Enter Filter Conditions
Period: Enter the month number (e.g. 7 for July).
Year: Enter the year (e.g. 2025).
Payslip Password: Open the mobile app to get your password
STEP 1: 
Log in using your personal account.
On the top menu bar, hover over [Payroll].
Click on [Employee Payslip].
STEP 3:
Open the Fast mobile app on your phone.
Go to Payslip section — the password will be shown at the top of
the screen.
STEP 4:
Use this password when filling in the Payslip Password field on the
computer.
Then click OK. 
Choose “Print” to view the full payslip and download it as a PDF or
print a hard copy.
